II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 756
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
755 - B 80961— 302 (2015/07)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —

i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g
wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk
whg m%udKj;a ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka
wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk
úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2015 cQ,s ui 24 jeks Èk m< lrk
.eiÜ m;%fha  oekaùï 2015 cQ,s ui 10 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
 2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m< l< hq;= njg hï
mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
ví,sõ' ta' ta' Ô' f*dkafiald"
rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s ^je' n'&'
2015 ckjdß ui 22 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2015'07'03756
osid ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - rejkaje,a,
wjika jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
rejkaje,a, osid$ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha wjika ù we;s wjqreÿ 05lg jvd mer‚ my; wxl i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2015'10'03 Èkg miq mq¿iaid
úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
02' hï md¾Yjlrefjl= ;udg wjYH jd¾;djl iy;sl msgm;la fyda f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH kï tA i|yd
2015'10'03 Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; whÿï l< hq;= h'
03' tfia b,a,Sula fkdjk my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka ish¨ kvq jd¾;d 2015'10'03 Èkg miq mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajd
isáñ'
Èid úksiqre - rejkaje,a,'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2015'07'03782

fkd;dßia wd{dmk; ^m;a lssÍï&
fkd;dßia wd{dmkf;a 03 jk j.ka;sh hgf;a" iajfoaY lghq;= iy
ëjr weu;s;=ud úiska my; i|yka m;aùï lr ;sfí (
01' fmd,a.ia´úg" jE;r" wxl 20 ys mÈxÑ" lreKdisxyf.a ;=Idß
Yl=ka;,d lreKdisxy uy;añh" mdkÿr wêlrK l,dmh
;=< isxy, NdIdfjka lghq;= lrk fkd;dßiajßhl jYfhka"
02' mkaksmsáh" fldÜgdj" wxl 506$3 ys mÈxÑ" bfrdaIa yf¾kaø
wuqúg.u uy;d" wúiaidfõ,a, wêlrK l,dmh ;=< isxy,
NdIdfjka lghq;= lrk fkd;dßiajrfhl= jYfhka"
03' .d,a," jlaje,a," ymq.," fyÜáwdrÉÑf.a j;a;" wxl 191 ys
mÈxÑ" fodka Èkql Y%Sud,a fmdkakïfmreu uy;d" .d,a,
wêlrK l,dmh ;=< isxy, NdIdfjka lghq;= lrk
fkd;dßiajrfhl= jYfhka"
04' uq,af,aßhdj kj k.rh" f.d;gqj" f.d;gqj mdr" wxl 65$3 ta
ys mÈxÑ" r;akdhl uqÈhkafia,df.a ,nq;, j,õfõ udfk,a
m%shx.sld r;akdhl fufkúh" fld<U wêlrK l,dmh ;=<
isxy, NdIdfjka lghq;= lrk fkd;dßiajßhl jYfhka"
05' f.dakdmSkqj," fír;=vqj mdr" y,a.yj;a; ys mÈxÑ" fõf,akaø
uq,a wdrÉÑ,df.a chkd ch,xld fõf,akaø uy;añh" .d,a,

fkd;dßia wd{dmk; ^m;a lsÍï&

03' r;a.u" mkaú," tïmSãt,a ksjdi" wxl 24 ys mÈxÑ" iurf.a

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2015'07'03 795
.eiÜ m;%h m< lsÍu ms<sn|j jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
i;sm;d uqøKh jk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha  .eiÜ m;%h idudkHfhka  isl=rdod Èkj, m<  lrkq ,efí'
isl=rdod Èkhla rcfha ksjdvq Èkhla jQ  úg tu isl=rdod  Èkg m%:u jev lrk Èkfha .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'  ta wkqj .eiÜ m;%fha
m< lsÍu i|yd  ksfõok Ndr.kakd wka;su  Èkh o tu i;sfha we;sjk  ksjdvq Èk .Kk wkqj fjkia  jkq  we;'
ta ta .eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ±kaùï Ndr .kakd wka;su Èkh iy fõ,djka  my; m< lr we;s Wmf,aLkfha ±lafõ'
